scripts.bench: pnpm -r --filter @proj/* run build && pnpm -C packages/bench-harness run bench
scripts.bench:medium: pnpm -r --filter @proj/* run build && pnpm -C packages/bench-harness run bench:medium
scripts.bench:large: pnpm -r --filter @proj/* run build && pnpm -C packages/bench-harness run bench:large
scripts.bench:netem: sudo bash scripts/setup-netem.sh lo 40ms 10ms 1% && pnpm bench && sudo bash scripts/clear-netem.sh
scripts.bench:delay: sudo bash scripts/setup-netem.sh lo 40ms 10ms 0% && pnpm bench && sudo bash scripts/clear-netem.sh lo
scripts.bench:loss: sudo bash scripts/setup-netem.sh lo 0ms 0ms 1% && pnpm bench && sudo bash scripts/clear-netem.sh lo
scripts.bench:mixed: sudo bash scripts/setup-netem.sh lo 40ms 10ms 1% && pnpm bench && sudo bash scripts/clear-netem.sh lo
scripts.bench:bursty: sudo bash scripts/setup-netem.sh lo 10ms 2ms 1% 25% && pnpm bench && sudo bash scripts/clear-netem.sh lo
scripts.bench:slowlink: sudo bash scripts/setup-netem.sh lo 60ms 20ms 0% 0% 10mbit && pnpm bench && sudo bash scripts/clear-netem.sh lo
